content:
Combine logical groups of elements inside a collapsible container with the Block element on a FlexCard. For example, group an Account's basic information together, and separately, group the account's Contact information together.

From the FlexCard Designer, drag a Block element from the Build panel into a state on the canvas.
(Optional) Update the element name in the Element Name field.
(Optional) Check Collapsible to enable collapsing the block.
(Optional) Enter text in the Label field for a visible label.
Beginning Summer '21, Label supports concatenated strings.

To add elements inside the Block element:
Drag an element from the Build panel into the block.
The Element Name of any new element added is prepended with "Block".
Click and drag an element from a state into the block.
 
FlexCards Block Properties are configurable in the Property Panel. With the Block element, combine logical groups of elements in a collapsible container.

Preview your FlexCard. See Preview a FlexCard.
title: Working with Blocks in FlexCards
